name: ASP.NET + JQuery Server Controls
short_description:
This library contains a fair few (some12 or so) asp server controls that render JQuery + UI components as replacements for the standard controls.

It utilises embedded script resources using .axd and has all the jquery ui inbuilt themes

Some of them have a bit of work to complete but mostly done (odd missing image)

The library also has a fair few 'best of breed' jquery plugins for Multi Select, Drop down lists, and image scrollers (from memory Nivo Slider)
summary: A set of asp jquery server controls with jqui theming + script incl
